page.title: 17THE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: We have a Village Hall Committee. The committee runs the hall.They have a meeting every month to see what to do. Mrs Rodber collects the money to borrow the hall.What you pay depends on who you are borrowing the hall. If you live in the village it doesn't cost so much as it does outsiders to the village. There are 20 _30 people in the committee. The village hall was built in 1971. They have many clubs every week : Mon _ Cubs and Guides Tues _Youth club Wed _ Clean up Thurs _ Brownies Fri _ School drama. These are only a sample of the activities. The hall stands in its own recreation ground with room for football pitch, car park and play area.
